definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: From that day on, the Klatooinians were property of the Hutt criminal empire.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，克拉图因人便归属于赫特人的犯罪帝国。

sentences.english: after World Trade Center was knocked down.
sentences.chinese: 在世贸中心被炸毁以后。

sentences.english: We can talk about it all another time.
So the chemo finished. Then, blood began to appear in the patient's urine.
sentences.chinese: 后来，化疗结束以后，病人出现了血尿。

sentences.english: If a new strategy works, then it will be adopted and further routinized as a rule of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 如果新办法行得通，以后就会沿用而成为经验法则。

sentences.english: After making his tea, I asked if it would be all right if I visited him again .
sentences.chinese: 给他泡好茶之后，我问他以后是否可以再来拜访。

sentences.english: I have a job interview in an hour and none of it is coming off.
sentences.chinese: 我一个小时以后要去面试，这些玩意怎么也洗不掉。

sentences.english: After P3 generation, cells presented in uniform morphology.
sentences.chinese: P3代以后，细胞形态较单一。

sentences.english: TITANIA Perchance till after Theseus ' wedding-day.
sentences.chinese: 也许要到忒修斯的婚礼以后。

sentences.english: After that the struggle inside the party grew more acute.
sentences.chinese: 在那以后，党内的斗争变得更加尖锐。

sentences.english: Of course, lots of cookies means some of them must be put away for later days.
sentences.chinese: 当然，大量的曲奇就意味着有一些会被留着以后再吃。

sentences.english: Yes, we have a two-room apartment free after the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 对，这个周末以后我们可以腾出一套两居室的公寓。

sentences.english: From now on you are the official Statue of Liberty of this street.
sentences.chinese: 从今以后，你就是这条街上名正言顺的自由神像。

sentences.english: The land has appreciated greatly since the new railway was buit.
sentences.chinese: 自从新铁路筑成以后，这块地的价值大为增高。

sentences.english: He would give entire earnings to Campbell's family from succeeding bouts.
sentences.chinese: 而他以后比赛的所有奖金将全部交给坎贝尔的家人。

sentences.english: After they moved the bag away, the girls let the traffic go again.
sentences.chinese: 等他们把口袋搬开以后，姑娘们再让车辆通行。

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
